pullrequest.title: Remove URI scehem when finding files

content.raw:
I confirmed that this change allows the following syntax to successfully load a model from disk using an absolute path:

```
<include>
  <uri>file:///home/gerkey/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/X3 UAV Config 5/2</uri>
</include>
```

I proposed a minor improvement in pull request #652. Otherwise, lgtm.
content.html:
I confirmed that this change allows the following syntax to successfully load a model from disk using an absolute path:

<include>
  <uri>file:///home/gerkey/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/X3 UAV Config 5/2</uri>
</include>

I proposed a minor improvement in pull request #652. Otherwise, lgtm.
